## AlCabinet.set() method

Sets a property in the cabinet (and schedules synchronization)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(property: string, value: any, ttl?: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  property | <code>string</code> | The name of the property. |
|  value | <code>any</code> | The value to set it to. |
|  ttl | <code>number</code> | The number of seconds the data should be retained for. Defaults to <code>0</code> (indefinite). |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`

A reference to the cabinet instance, so that calls to it may be chained.
